thread.section_title: PolicyGenius Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PolicyGenius | policygenius.com
thread.title: Theadora

author: Theadora
title: Theadora
text: Policy Genius was wonderful in helping my family find the best policies. Both my husband and I used them to find life insurance. With PolicyGenius, we were able to get the best policies for us individually without having to go with the same company because it would be easier. PolicyGenius representatives were available by phone and email to answer any of my questions. I was even able to get a better rate than originally expected.
